author: cnbc.com
title: JAGGAER Appoints New Global CFO
text:
RESEARCH TRIANGLE, N.C., May 14, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- JAGGAER , the world’s largest independent spend management company, has just appointed technology industry specialist Vic Chynoweth as the company’s first Global Chief Financial Officer. Chynoweth brings 14 years of industry experience with several multinational companies to JAGGAER. He was most recently at Planview, Inc., where he led finance for a global enterprise software company.
“Our rapid growth into world markets, embracing over 70 countries, has created a need for our first global CFO. Vic brings JAGGAER critical experience through his work with globally focused software companies. He is a welcome addition to the team and will help with our plans to become the world’s largest spend management company,” explained Rob Bonavito, CEO of JAGGAER.
Chynoweth has extensive international experience and will be travelling to all JAGGAER offices, to manage multiple corporate operations. He received his BS from University of Colorado and MBA from University of Washington.
About JAGGAER: Global Indirect and Direct Spend Management Solutions
JAGGAER is the world’s largest independent spend management company, with over 1,900 customers connected to a network of 3.7 million suppliers in 70 countries, served by offices located in North America, Latin America, throughout Europe, the United Kingdom, Australia, Asia, and the Middle East. JAGGAER offers complete SaaS-based indirect and direct eProcurement solutions with advanced spend analytics, complex sourcing, supplier management, contract lifecycle management, savings tracking, and intelligent workflow capabilities. We have pioneered spend solutions for over two decades and continue to lead the innovation curve by listening to customers and analyzing the market. Our solution suites are trusted by the world’s largest education, manufacturing, health care, retail, consumer package goods, logistics, construction, utilities companies and public service organizations. Additionally, JAGGAER holds 38 patents–more than any other spend management company. www.JAGGAER.com
